text: Louis Wain is an upcoming biographical film directed by Will Sharpe and written by Sharpe and Simon Stephenson. It stars Benedict Cumberbatch, Claire Foy, Andrea Riseborough and Toby Jones. ==Premise== Depicts the life of artist Louis Wain. ==Cast== *Benedict Cumberbatch as Louis Wain *Claire Foy as Emily Richardson-Wain *Andrea Riseborough *Toby Jones *Hayley Squires *Stacy Martin *Julian Barratt *Sharon Rooney *Aimee Lou Wood as Claire *Adeel Akhtar *Asim Chaudhry *Indica Watson *Sophia Di Martino as Judith ==Production== Simon Stephenson's original script was selected for the Britlist of the UK's hottest unproduced scripts in 2014. The film was announced in July 2019, with Benedict Cumberbatch, Claire Foy, Andrea Riseborough and Toby Jones cast. Will Sharpe would co-write and direct, with filming beginning on August 10 in London.And Deal kent Benedict Cumberbatch & Claire Foy To Star In Movie ‘Louis Wain’ For StudioCanal, SunnyMarch, Shoebox, Film4 & Amazon In August 2019, Hayley Squires, Stacy Martin, Julian Barratt, Sharon Rooney, Aimee Lou Wood, Adeel Akhtar and Asim Chaudhry joined the cast of the film. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Upcoming films Category:American films Category:British films Category:American drama films Category:British drama films Category:American biographical films Category:British biographical films Category:Amazon Studios films Category:Film4 Productions films Category:StudioCanal films
title: Louis Wain (film)
